name: Neckromancer
description: Welcome, Neckromancer, this is, in fact, a bang up  job where you don’t really resurrect but you DO SAVE PEOPLE’s Necks. Get them Necks from the tray, doc, better take your time and think, if you make too many mistakes, the imposter syndrome  and maybe the…shabby conditions, will kill ya. Match the head to the Neck, carefully! This isn’t a sprint, ya hear! - B
